attributes.additional_details:
I call on the government to close all jobcentres as they do NOT provide any real term help in employment support or opportunites.

The staff can be rude, unhelpful, patronising and demeaning.  Most of the jobs advertised have been proven to be false and non-existant in order to justify the figures.  fact - Jobcentre managers are rewarded a daily commission for getting people into work, or for penalising those people with sanctions over such pathetic excuses like a simple one-off mistake' of 'forgetting to bring a job diary in just one occassion''

The DWP have even admitted they set monthly benefit sanction quotas for each jobcentre to attain, even for no clear understandable reason.
